text: Kinsley was absolutely 100% spot on in every aspect of customer service and product knowledge. She truly is a very valuable asset to your organization.

resp.text: Thank you Johnny! We're so happy to see you enjoyed your recent visit to our store. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to see you again soon!

name: Jonathon Farmer
text: Fantastic customer service team. Couldn’t have asked for a better store to come to Elba.

resp.text: We're so happy to see you enjoyed your recent visit to our store, Jonathon. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to see you again soon!

name: Brandy Caldwell
text: Excellent service! Fast and very helpful!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 star review, Brandy! We're delighted to see you had a positive experience during your visit to our store.

name: Travis Love
text: They have been around a long time and have always been a great place to buy furniture and appliances at far better prices than their competitors

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your feedback, Travis! We're so glad you enjoy shopping with us!

name: DANIELLE NELSON
text: Turtle was awesome in helping with my purchases and getting me financed!!! My new favorite furniture store!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 star review! We're delighted to see you had a positive experience during your visit to our store Danielle.

name: Janna Bennetts
text: Not even upset about the how long it took to get our things in as this is something every business is struggling with, but the customer service at this place is absolutely horrible. Will not do business with this place again.

name: Emily Miles
text: Not friendly at all, as I ask questions about a seat it was like I was nothing more than a bother.... I am all for supporting local businesses. However, the attitude did it for me on this one!

name: Ashley Cole
text: Awesome selection ! Everything from breast feeding/pumping supplies to nursery must haves...not to mention the sweetest variety of clothing and accessories.

name: Hena Jenkins
text: Wow! This place was phenomenal. Just about everything you can imagine for babies and children. The staff were all very sweet and made wonderful suggestions about products. They know their inventory very well and will give you honest feedback about what worked/didn’t work for them. I personally prefer to shop local because I’m a “feeler” and want to know exactly what I am purchasing beforehand.I definitely recommend coming in here if you are expecting/have little ones or are buying for someone else. It was such a fun experience and I’m looking forward to coming back in the future.

name: Lacye McCormick
text: Employees were very helpful and nice. Store felt very clean. They had a huge selection of baby/toddler clothing as well as toys, hair bows, baby furniture and gear. Can’t wait to return!

name: J M
text: I've been here a few times since finding out that I was going to have a grandbaby and the girls working there have always been extremely nice. They have the cutest and most unique baby things in there. I love shopping here and will be back soon! 👶❤️

name: Cynthia Crocker
text: My sister and I visited Posh Mommy and Baby Too today for the very first time. Both of us had a great shopping experience. I absolutely love the baby and children’s clothing and found the prices very reasonable considering it is a boutique. They also carry a large assortment of bows of every color imaginable as well as all sorts of accessories. What really impressed me most was the friendliness of the owner and staff. Every one was wonderful.  I visited the boutique with two of my young grandchildren (I don’t know what I was thinking😳) and the ladies were so helpful and even helped keep them busy while I shopped.  This boutique is my new go-to for future children’s purchases. Thank you ladies!

resp.text: Cynthia, we're so happy that you enjoyed our selection, prices, and customer service. Myself and my staff are always happy to help you find whatever you need or want while you're in our store. Keeping the little ones busy is just a perk for us! Thanks for stopping by, and we look forward to seeing you again in the future. -Lisa V., Owner

name: Danielle Clem
text: If I could give them 0 stars I would. I would advise never purchasing furniture or anything from them. They are so rude and will not own up to their mistakes. If you do plan on it either never arriving or way after they say it will. You are much better off buying somewhere else.

resp.text: Ms Clem, we have done an extensive research under your name, we register every customer that makes a purchase in our store, and you show up as never making a purchase.  Maybe you are confused with another baby store in the area?  Posh Mommy & Baby Too prides ourselves in customer service.  Should a customer have an issue with a product, service or employee in our store I encourage them to share the problem with myself, the owner, to see if we can come up with an equitable solution.

name: Samantha Jones
text: I went in here once. I am currently pregnant with my first and was hoping to find adorable boutique style clothing. I found just that, but I felt like I couldn’t look around without being watched. There were two sales associates there eyeballing me and giving me dirty looks the whole time. I didn’t feel like I could safely shop with that going on. Cute clothes but not worth the rude sales associates....

name: Faye Ahzburjn
text: They have beautiful baby and children's clothing, shoes, cloth diapers, jewelry including amber necklaces. Cribs and bedding. Hair bows galore! I love going in to shop for my granddaughter occasionally but it's expensive! That's the only reason I don't give it 5 stars. Cute and Posh!

name: Kelly W
text: I love shopping at Posh Mommy & Baby Too!  I have been shopping there for seven years and have NEVER had a bad experience!!  The owners are the best!  They know us by name and are always super friendly.  I've gotten everything from the door hanger for my hospital room, hair bows, swimwear, clothing, shoes, toys and monogramming from this store. Love PM&BT!!

name: Amber Winn
text: Cute shop, but the lack of boy clothes is sad. There were multiple racks of girl clothes and maybe 2 racks of boy clothes. Check out All About Baby in Huntsville instead, many more boy clothing options.

name: Madison Turner
text: Their customer service is great! They where so helpful and they even helped me out when they where about to close down for the day. For a first time mom that was running late and a little scrambled , they helped me alot and maid my day.

resp.text: Ms Yarbrough, thank you for the outstanding review.  It was a pleasure to work with you.  We love interacting with first time moms and all customers in our store.  We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Ellen Helton
text: Great local shop for all your baby needs. The staff is friendly and very knowledgeable. It is nice to be able to actually touch and see the products before you buy them!

resp.text: Our team loves being able to help, Ellen! Glad you enjoyed coming in to figure out the best items. If you need anything, we're always here for you. -Lisa V., Owner

name: Samantha Giruzzi
text: I placed a large furniture order on Saturday.  Over the weekend, I began regretting the color we ordered. Worried all weekend I wouldn't be able to change it, I went in Monday morning and it was no issue at all to change the color for my order. The owner was more than happy to change my order and get us the new color we wanted. Customer service was excellent and I couldn't be happier. Thank you, Posh Mommy!

resp.text:
We're always more than happy to make sure you get exactly what furniture you want, Samantha -- swapping colors was no problem whatsoever! If you ever need anything else, we're here for you.

Best,
Lisa V., Owner

name: Sandi S
text: I love, love this store. They always have what I'm looking for and much more. From baby furniture to shoes, this shop has it all. The employees are always helpful whether I'm shopping in the store or on the phone with them. I highly recommend this shop when shopping for all your baby needs.

name: Gail Schwartz
text: This is a very professionally run store.  A new mother can find anything in this store she needs and if, for some reason, they don't have what you need they will do their utmost to find it.   No one hovered over me (as if I were a shoplifter) but someone was available to help when I was ready.  I will refer my friends to this store and continue to visit it.

name: Christy Payne
text: I absolutely love this store.  They have so many unique items and keep their fb page updated of new products and sales going on.  They have reasonably priced monogramming and even helped connect me with someone to help me with a very specific need I had.  Wonderful, wonderful store!!

name: kelsiroberts
text: I have no clue why there are so many rude comments. They were so helpful when we went to purchase our furniture. They placed our furniture order and it came in in 19 days! Their prices are comparable to other stores plus they really work with you to help you afford everything you need! My husband and I will definitely continue to shop here!

name: Larry Vannoy
text: Ms Riley, I am sorry you feel your brother and sister-in-law were treated unfairly.  We showed you the contract your sister-in-law signed stating that it could take up to 16 weeks to take delivery of the special ordered furniture.  One week into the order they started contacting us asking us about the status of the furniture delivery and   on every occasion we reminded them that special ordered furniture can take up to sixteen weeks but we hoped it would arrive much sooner.  We kept them abreast of status and put a caveat during each daily call to us that we were forwarding them what we had been told from the manufacturer and shipping company.  WE GOT IT TO YOU IN A MONTH, and during the Christmas shipping backlogs and snow storm at the manufacturer!     We are sorry that you thought your brother and sister-in-law were mistreated.  We believe we went far beyond what is considered great customer service in making such a quick delivery.

name: jacqueline so sad to hear this patterson
text: If you need anything for baby ,this is your place ! Very friendly , helpful and kind staff  !  You can get anything  pertaining  to baby or mommy  here ! Cribs,rockers,  clothes car seats to bows and necklace.  Love this place !!

resp.text: I hope it's not too late to thank you for this, Jacqueline -- we love helping out however we can. If you need anything else, feel free to stop by or give us a call. -Lisa V., Owner

name: Tammie Stroud
text: Great help. Unusual items. Beautiful gift bag.

resp.text: Happy you stopped in, Tammie! Hoping you'll make it back our way again soon. -Lisa V., Owner

name: Tabitha Riley
text: My brother made full payment on a crib and dresser set on Oct. 21st when my sister-in-law was 9 months pregnant. Posh Mommy however assured them that the furniture could be delivered in a few weeks. My nephew was born Nov. 16th and as of today Nov. 21st, no furniture has arrived.  Over the past few weeks my brother has made several attempts to get a delivery date for the purchased furniture to no avail.  The owners have chosen to be rude, verbally aggressive, and dishonest with all communication after payment was received. The owners have shown my family such poor customer service that I would NEVER refer anyone to shop at Posh Mommy. For first time parents, selecting and buying furniture should be joyous but Posh Mommy turned it into a nightmare.

resp.text: Ms Riley, as I shared with your brother, Mr Jackson: as we discussed on the multiple occasions, as signed in the contract with the store, it can take multiple weeks, worst case up to 16 weeks for furniture to arrive at our store. This is driven by many reasons, all attributable to the manufacturer, be it that furniture is in production, frequently overseas, shipment from overseas, tied up in customs, delivery warehouse problems, etc. We work our very best to make customers happy but unfortunately in this situation, your expectations did not line up with the contract.

name: Jenni Lawson
text: I came on here to look for pictures to show my friends and saw the rude comments and couldn't believe it. Every time I come into this store they greet me immediately and check on my throughout my visit. I had a horrible itching problem and they even loaded me up on free samples of different products to try to see which ones were more effective! I bring my first born with me as well and they give her balloons and play around with her to help me get through the store! I've never had a problem here and just felt compelled to leave a comment after reading the other ones.

name: Lisa Sinyard
text: This is the best baby store! The merchandise is quality and prices are good. The registry is easy for Mommy and gifter!

resp.text: We're grateful for your support, Lisa! Glad we could help you find great merchandise at a good price. Let us know if you need anything at all. -Lisa V., Owner

name: Kyle Hoffman
text: I cant thank them enough for all there help and guidance through our cloth diapering and preemie clothing. Our little girl was 34 weeks and Lisa made sure clothes we got would fit. Which can be confusing considering all the sizes p1,p2,p3 ,preemie, newborn and etc. Which to a Dad can be hard to keep straight and overwhelming sometimes. Excellent service all the around. Thanks you so much.

name: Jessica Sheridan
text: Posh Mommy always has what I'm looking for! They have a wonderful selection of children's clothes, toys, gifts, and baby furniture. They also do personalized and custom monograming. I love this store!

name: Jennifer Day
text: Terrible customer service!  I've truly never experienced customer service this bad.  Back in March, I ordered a crib converter to convert my child's crib to a toddler bed. I was told it would take a little over a month for it to come in and they would call me as soon as it did.  The money came out of my account the day I placed the order. About 2 and half months later I still had not heard from them, so I called asking about my order.  They had absolutely no record of my order, however, I told them I had proof because I can show my bank statement where the money came out of my account.  They basically said they would call the company and work on getting it to me ASAP and they were supposed to call me back.  I never heard back from them.  This was just the beginning of many false promises and unreturned phone calls.  After I decided I couldn't deal with them anymore I went on the web and found the exact crib converter kit that I needed for less than half the price they sold it to me for.  At this point, I called and said I wanted my money back.  They agreed to return my money, but said they would have to mail it to me.  It has now been almost 5 months since I placed this order and I have yet to receive a crib converter or my money back.  And they are continuing to blow me off and not return my phone calls.  At this point, I'm at a loss for what to do. I know for sure, I will NEVER shop there again though.

name: J Brosemer
text: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE. EXTREMELY RUDE AND UNPROFESSIONAL. WILL NEVER RETURN!!! My wife bought an umbrella stroller from there about a week ago. We had some unexpected expenses arise and I went there with the receipt to return it. We had it just over a week and had never even taken it out of the car. It still had all the plastic on it and had never even been unfolded. When I walked in, they were not busy at all. There may have been three or four people in the entire store. I walked up to the counter and waited and waited and waited some more until finally going and asking someone to help me. I told him what I was there for and he immediately said they do not give refunds. He said he couldn't take back a used product and he could not be out that money. He was extremely rude and basically called me a liar. He said the stroller was obviously used because one of the wheels had a scuff on it. My wife had gotten him to roll it out to the car before she purchased it to make sure that it would fit in our vehicle. When I told him that's where the scuff came from he said oh no I took it straight out of the box so that's not possible. The stroller was a display model so there was no box at all. When I told him that I knew he was lying to me, he said well our return policy is posted on the counter there so if your wife is literate she could've read it. I wont go on about everything else that was said but I just want to let people know how they do business. He was EXTREMELY rude and unprofessional and I can see by all the other comments that I am not the only one who has experienced this. I will never shop there again and would advise anyone else not to either. I will be filing a report with the BBB and letting everyone I know how they treat people. A Nurturing Moment is a much better alternative. The woman there is very nice and polite and knowledgeable about the products she sells. To sum it up it was terrible experience.

resp.text: Mr Brosemer, as we talked at the time, the stroller your wife purchased at time had been used by her outside the store, we personally witnessed her using it.  Further we told her that it was sold to her at a discount and we were very specific with her that it was not returnable.  In addition, the stroller smelled like cigarette smoke and we would not be able to re-sell it.  I am sorry your expectations were not the same as was your wife's.

name: Jennifer Davis
text:
HORRIBLE HORRBILE HORRIBLE customer service!!!
Bought several items from them.
1-Bought a glider.  They didn't even order it and it was months later before we finally got it.
2-bought furniture from them (Young America).  It broke within a few weeks of having it and they would offer NO help in getting replacement parts!!!

PLEASE do not go here!  Shop at A Nurturing Moment or All About Baby!

name: Regina Smith
text: Horrible customer service. It is funny they are great until you have a problem with their merchandise. Then, they become very confrontational and all of a sudden it is not their problem. Their business in my opinion is very unethical. I WILL NEVER SHOP THERE AGAIN! I will go to Nurturing Moment or All About Baby from now on. I have all ways been treated with respect and dignity a these two places!

name: Tasha Wiley
text: I've been shopping here for many, many years and completely furnished my daughter's entire nursery from PM&B2.  While my friends were complaining that their baby furniture deliveries (ordered from other local shops) were running weeks behind schedule, mine was in the nursery and ready to go! I have never had anything but an amazing experience dealing with the owner and her staff.  The store is clean, well-organized, and there is always plenty to choose from.  It's specialty, one-of-a-kind stuff and always my first stop for hair bows/headbands and "Special Occasion" clothing & items.  Also, the Santa Pictures they do every year with Gallery Seven Photography is by far and away the BEST setup in Huntsville.  I know ladies who drive from Nashville to have their Christmas cards done at the store every year because the set and Santa are both so gorgeous!  Love this store and will continue to shop there!

name: E. Biggers
text: Professional staff who are always helpful and knowledgeable. I highly recommend Posh Mommy and Baby, Too to all my family and friends.

name: Justin Draughon
text: Great place to shop for babies and small children. They have clothes, furniture, and do monograms. The staff and owners are very helpful and accommodating.

name: Jeffrey Jackson
text:
*ATTENTION* Bad Customer Sevice ALERT!!!
On October 21, my wife(9 months pregnant) purchased a crib and double dresser from POSH MOMMY, located on Hwy 72 in Madison AL. The owner told my wife the set does not take long to come in, usually a couple of weeks and she will expedite the shipment. Since we purchased the set the customer service has been HORRENDOUS.!! When my wife purchased the set, they advised her a estimated delivery date would be provided on the following week since it was a weekend transaction and the Vendor was closed. Since that date the owner have failed to contact us on the delivery date. We made several attempts to establish a concrete date in which we were told by the owners, ‘that is not the way they do business’. On last Monday,  November 13, the owner reached out to me and said the crib and dresser would arrive on Thursday (Jax Birthday). After my wife was settled in her hospital room after having Jax, I called Posh Mommy to verify what time the truck was coming in order to pick up. The owner, Lisa told me ‘the truck had not arrived and she will call back later that day.’ I did not receive a phone call, in which I called the following day to pick up the set. Lisa’s husband (co owner) claims he did not tell me it will arrive on Thursday but he claimed he hoped it would arrive on Thursday. On Friday, November 17th, he stated the shipment will be in on today. As of today, November 21st, we have not received our furniture. The owner now claims it will be in on tomorrow. Please help me share this experience, I have filed a complaint with the BBB and other parents need to know how POSH MOMMY does business. My wife was 9 months pregnant when she purchased the set believing the owner at her word. I guess that means nothing these days.#cribforJAX

resp.text: Mr Jackson, as we discussed on the multiple occasions, as signed in the contract with the store, it can take multiple weeks, worst case up to 16 weeks for furniture to arrive at our store.  This is driven by many reasons, all attributable to the manufacturer, be it that furniture is in production, frequently overseas, shipment from overseas, tied up in customs, delivery warehouse problems, etc.  We work our very best to make customers happy but unfortunately in this situation, your expectations did not line up with the contract.

name: Margaret Sterling
text: They have got a nice bow selection and paci selection. Also like that it is a local establishment so the people working there usually follow up on your orders and products

name: Brittany S.
text: After reading all these reviews, I had to leave my experience on here. My husband and I were having a hard time finding a nursery that we could both agree on for our second child. I suggested Posh Mommy and we went in there last thinking we probably couldn't afford it. When I walked in the owner immediately greeted us and asked what we were looking for. When I told her baby furniture, she wanted to show me her collection that was on sale. It was the Dolce Babi Grazi Crib and the pieces with it. It came in vanilla bean which is a vintage white and I loved it! It was a great deal and very well made. She pretty much had it over 1,000 dollars cheaper than the original prices. She let us look with no pressure. She told us she had already ordered it so if we were interested to let her know because she would hold it for us. We decided a few days later that that is what we wanted and when we called and told her, she also gave us 20% off the conversion kit because it was being ordered all at once. So we waited about a week and a half and our crib was there! (bc it was already ordered it didn't take as long as most orders) My husband and a friend went to pick it up and she was having a Veterans Day sale that weekend and our crib price dropped $100. So she felt sorry for us that we missed the sale and GAVE US A FREE CRIB MATTRESS AND TODDLER RAIL!!! I was blown away by her generosity. I had no idea that the crib price dropped so when she offered us all of that it really meant so much! The items she gave us retail way more than that $100 dollars. I am very impressed and plan on giving them more business in the future. THANKS POSH MOMMY ;)

name: Keith Morgan
text: It is the place to go for all things baby. The people there know a lot about what you need

name: Tammy G
text: Not made to feel welcomed unless purchasing something big. Not a warm atmosphere.

resp.text: Tammy, I am sorry to see that your experience at Posh Mommy & Baby Too was not positive. Should you have a negative experience, please take a moment to find me in the store and share your issue. We will do our best to try to satisfy your needs.

name: Yvette Torbert
text: Always have exactly what I need. A little pricey, BUT ALWAYS quality.

name: Jocelyn Merkel
text: The employees at Posh Mommy are so incredibly RUDE! I will never again set foot in this place. The owner treated me like I was an inconvenience and a waste of her time. I was speechless-- I've never been treated so poorly by a local business. I don't know how they stay open.

name: Hallie Wallis
text: Great little baby boutique! So much to choose from!

name: Yolanda Black
text: Always find quality items at this boutique for children, as well as, items for Mommy too!

resp.text: Thrilled to know you enjoy our high quality selection, Yolanda! Hoping to see you again soon. -Lisa V., Owner

name: Nettie Savell
text: Employees were helpful and nice.

name: Barbara Randa
text: Wonderful storr

name: Tammy Cashon
text: Love this shop!

resp.text: Tammy, thank you for your great review! Come back to see us soon. -Lisa V., Owner

name: Janna Bennetts
text: Not even upset about the how long it took to get our things in as this is something every business is struggling with, but the customer service at this place is absolutely horrible. Will not do business with this place again.

name: Emily Miles
text: Not friendly at all, as I ask questions about a seat it was like I was nothing more than a bother.... I am all for supporting local businesses. However, the attitude did it for me on this one!

name: Ashley Cole
text: Awesome selection ! Everything from breast feeding/pumping supplies to nursery must haves...not to mention the sweetest variety of clothing and accessories.

name: Hena Jenkins
text: Wow! This place was phenomenal. Just about everything you can imagine for babies and children. The staff were all very sweet and made wonderful suggestions about products. They know their inventory very well and will give you honest feedback about what worked/didn’t work for them. I personally prefer to shop local because I’m a “feeler” and want to know exactly what I am purchasing beforehand.I definitely recommend coming in here if you are expecting/have little ones or are buying for someone else. It was such a fun experience and I’m looking forward to coming back in the future.

name: Lacye McCormick
text: Employees were very helpful and nice. Store felt very clean. They had a huge selection of baby/toddler clothing as well as toys, hair bows, baby furniture and gear. Can’t wait to return!

name: J M
text: I've been here a few times since finding out that I was going to have a grandbaby and the girls working there have always been extremely nice. They have the cutest and most unique baby things in there. I love shopping here and will be back soon! 👶❤️

name: Cynthia Crocker
text: My sister and I visited Posh Mommy and Baby Too today for the very first time. Both of us had a great shopping experience. I absolutely love the baby and children’s clothing and found the prices very reasonable considering it is a boutique. They also carry a large assortment of bows of every color imaginable as well as all sorts of accessories. What really impressed me most was the friendliness of the owner and staff. Every one was wonderful.  I visited the boutique with two of my young grandchildren (I don’t know what I was thinking😳) and the ladies were so helpful and even helped keep them busy while I shopped.  This boutique is my new go-to for future children’s purchases. Thank you ladies!

resp.text: Cynthia, we're so happy that you enjoyed our selection, prices, and customer service. Myself and my staff are always happy to help you find whatever you need or want while you're in our store. Keeping the little ones busy is just a perk for us! Thanks for stopping by, and we look forward to seeing you again in the future. -Lisa V., Owner

name: Danielle Clem
text: If I could give them 0 stars I would. I would advise never purchasing furniture or anything from them. They are so rude and will not own up to their mistakes. If you do plan on it either never arriving or way after they say it will. You are much better off buying somewhere else.

resp.text: Ms Clem, we have done an extensive research under your name, we register every customer that makes a purchase in our store, and you show up as never making a purchase.  Maybe you are confused with another baby store in the area?  Posh Mommy & Baby Too prides ourselves in customer service.  Should a customer have an issue with a product, service or employee in our store I encourage them to share the problem with myself, the owner, to see if we can come up with an equitable solution.

name: Samantha Jones
text: I went in here once. I am currently pregnant with my first and was hoping to find adorable boutique style clothing. I found just that, but I felt like I couldn’t look around without being watched. There were two sales associates there eyeballing me and giving me dirty looks the whole time. I didn’t feel like I could safely shop with that going on. Cute clothes but not worth the rude sales associates....

name: Faye Ahzburjn
text: They have beautiful baby and children's clothing, shoes, cloth diapers, jewelry including amber necklaces. Cribs and bedding. Hair bows galore! I love going in to shop for my granddaughter occasionally but it's expensive! That's the only reason I don't give it 5 stars. Cute and Posh!

name: Kelly W
text: I love shopping at Posh Mommy & Baby Too!  I have been shopping there for seven years and have NEVER had a bad experience!!  The owners are the best!  They know us by name and are always super friendly.  I've gotten everything from the door hanger for my hospital room, hair bows, swimwear, clothing, shoes, toys and monogramming from this store. Love PM&BT!!

name: Amber Winn
text: Cute shop, but the lack of boy clothes is sad. There were multiple racks of girl clothes and maybe 2 racks of boy clothes. Check out All About Baby in Huntsville instead, many more boy clothing options.

name: Madison Turner
text: Their customer service is great! They where so helpful and they even helped me out when they where about to close down for the day. For a first time mom that was running late and a little scrambled , they helped me alot and maid my day.

resp.text: Ms Yarbrough, thank you for the outstanding review.  It was a pleasure to work with you.  We love interacting with first time moms and all customers in our store.  We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Ellen Helton
text: Great local shop for all your baby needs. The staff is friendly and very knowledgeable. It is nice to be able to actually touch and see the products before you buy them!

resp.text: Our team loves being able to help, Ellen! Glad you enjoyed coming in to figure out the best items. If you need anything, we're always here for you. -Lisa V., Owner

name: Samantha Giruzzi
text: I placed a large furniture order on Saturday.  Over the weekend, I began regretting the color we ordered. Worried all weekend I wouldn't be able to change it, I went in Monday morning and it was no issue at all to change the color for my order. The owner was more than happy to change my order and get us the new color we wanted. Customer service was excellent and I couldn't be happier. Thank you, Posh Mommy!

resp.text:
We're always more than happy to make sure you get exactly what furniture you want, Samantha -- swapping colors was no problem whatsoever! If you ever need anything else, we're here for you.

Best,
Lisa V., Owner

name: Sandi S
text: I love, love this store. They always have what I'm looking for and much more. From baby furniture to shoes, this shop has it all. The employees are always helpful whether I'm shopping in the store or on the phone with them. I highly recommend this shop when shopping for all your baby needs.

name: Gail Schwartz
text: This is a very professionally run store.  A new mother can find anything in this store she needs and if, for some reason, they don't have what you need they will do their utmost to find it.   No one hovered over me (as if I were a shoplifter) but someone was available to help when I was ready.  I will refer my friends to this store and continue to visit it.

name: Christy Payne
text: I absolutely love this store.  They have so many unique items and keep their fb page updated of new products and sales going on.  They have reasonably priced monogramming and even helped connect me with someone to help me with a very specific need I had.  Wonderful, wonderful store!!

name: kelsiroberts
text: I have no clue why there are so many rude comments. They were so helpful when we went to purchase our furniture. They placed our furniture order and it came in in 19 days! Their prices are comparable to other stores plus they really work with you to help you afford everything you need! My husband and I will definitely continue to shop here!

name: Larry Vannoy
text: Ms Riley, I am sorry you feel your brother and sister-in-law were treated unfairly.  We showed you the contract your sister-in-law signed stating that it could take up to 16 weeks to take delivery of the special ordered furniture.  One week into the order they started contacting us asking us about the status of the furniture delivery and   on every occasion we reminded them that special ordered furniture can take up to sixteen weeks but we hoped it would arrive much sooner.  We kept them abreast of status and put a caveat during each daily call to us that we were forwarding them what we had been told from the manufacturer and shipping company.  WE GOT IT TO YOU IN A MONTH, and during the Christmas shipping backlogs and snow storm at the manufacturer!     We are sorry that you thought your brother and sister-in-law were mistreated.  We believe we went far beyond what is considered great customer service in making such a quick delivery.

name: jacqueline so sad to hear this patterson
text: If you need anything for baby ,this is your place ! Very friendly , helpful and kind staff  !  You can get anything  pertaining  to baby or mommy  here ! Cribs,rockers,  clothes car seats to bows and necklace.  Love this place !!

resp.text: I hope it's not too late to thank you for this, Jacqueline -- we love helping out however we can. If you need anything else, feel free to stop by or give us a call. -Lisa V., Owner

name: Tammie Stroud
text: Great help. Unusual items. Beautiful gift bag.

resp.text: Happy you stopped in, Tammie! Hoping you'll make it back our way again soon. -Lisa V., Owner

name: Tabitha Riley
text: My brother made full payment on a crib and dresser set on Oct. 21st when my sister-in-law was 9 months pregnant. Posh Mommy however assured them that the furniture could be delivered in a few weeks. My nephew was born Nov. 16th and as of today Nov. 21st, no furniture has arrived.  Over the past few weeks my brother has made several attempts to get a delivery date for the purchased furniture to no avail.  The owners have chosen to be rude, verbally aggressive, and dishonest with all communication after payment was received. The owners have shown my family such poor customer service that I would NEVER refer anyone to shop at Posh Mommy. For first time parents, selecting and buying furniture should be joyous but Posh Mommy turned it into a nightmare.

resp.text: Ms Riley, as I shared with your brother, Mr Jackson: as we discussed on the multiple occasions, as signed in the contract with the store, it can take multiple weeks, worst case up to 16 weeks for furniture to arrive at our store. This is driven by many reasons, all attributable to the manufacturer, be it that furniture is in production, frequently overseas, shipment from overseas, tied up in customs, delivery warehouse problems, etc. We work our very best to make customers happy but unfortunately in this situation, your expectations did not line up with the contract.

name: Jenni Lawson
text: I came on here to look for pictures to show my friends and saw the rude comments and couldn't believe it. Every time I come into this store they greet me immediately and check on my throughout my visit. I had a horrible itching problem and they even loaded me up on free samples of different products to try to see which ones were more effective! I bring my first born with me as well and they give her balloons and play around with her to help me get through the store! I've never had a problem here and just felt compelled to leave a comment after reading the other ones.

name: Lisa Sinyard
text: This is the best baby store! The merchandise is quality and prices are good. The registry is easy for Mommy and gifter!

resp.text: We're grateful for your support, Lisa! Glad we could help you find great merchandise at a good price. Let us know if you need anything at all. -Lisa V., Owner

name: Kyle Hoffman
text: I cant thank them enough for all there help and guidance through our cloth diapering and preemie clothing. Our little girl was 34 weeks and Lisa made sure clothes we got would fit. Which can be confusing considering all the sizes p1,p2,p3 ,preemie, newborn and etc. Which to a Dad can be hard to keep straight and overwhelming sometimes. Excellent service all the around. Thanks you so much.

name: Jessica Sheridan
text: Posh Mommy always has what I'm looking for! They have a wonderful selection of children's clothes, toys, gifts, and baby furniture. They also do personalized and custom monograming. I love this store!

name: Jennifer Day
text: Terrible customer service!  I've truly never experienced customer service this bad.  Back in March, I ordered a crib converter to convert my child's crib to a toddler bed. I was told it would take a little over a month for it to come in and they would call me as soon as it did.  The money came out of my account the day I placed the order. About 2 and half months later I still had not heard from them, so I called asking about my order.  They had absolutely no record of my order, however, I told them I had proof because I can show my bank statement where the money came out of my account.  They basically said they would call the company and work on getting it to me ASAP and they were supposed to call me back.  I never heard back from them.  This was just the beginning of many false promises and unreturned phone calls.  After I decided I couldn't deal with them anymore I went on the web and found the exact crib converter kit that I needed for less than half the price they sold it to me for.  At this point, I called and said I wanted my money back.  They agreed to return my money, but said they would have to mail it to me.  It has now been almost 5 months since I placed this order and I have yet to receive a crib converter or my money back.  And they are continuing to blow me off and not return my phone calls.  At this point, I'm at a loss for what to do. I know for sure, I will NEVER shop there again though.

name: J Brosemer
text: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE. EXTREMELY RUDE AND UNPROFESSIONAL. WILL NEVER RETURN!!! My wife bought an umbrella stroller from there about a week ago. We had some unexpected expenses arise and I went there with the receipt to return it. We had it just over a week and had never even taken it out of the car. It still had all the plastic on it and had never even been unfolded. When I walked in, they were not busy at all. There may have been three or four people in the entire store. I walked up to the counter and waited and waited and waited some more until finally going and asking someone to help me. I told him what I was there for and he immediately said they do not give refunds. He said he couldn't take back a used product and he could not be out that money. He was extremely rude and basically called me a liar. He said the stroller was obviously used because one of the wheels had a scuff on it. My wife had gotten him to roll it out to the car before she purchased it to make sure that it would fit in our vehicle. When I told him that's where the scuff came from he said oh no I took it straight out of the box so that's not possible. The stroller was a display model so there was no box at all. When I told him that I knew he was lying to me, he said well our return policy is posted on the counter there so if your wife is literate she could've read it. I wont go on about everything else that was said but I just want to let people know how they do business. He was EXTREMELY rude and unprofessional and I can see by all the other comments that I am not the only one who has experienced this. I will never shop there again and would advise anyone else not to either. I will be filing a report with the BBB and letting everyone I know how they treat people. A Nurturing Moment is a much better alternative. The woman there is very nice and polite and knowledgeable about the products she sells. To sum it up it was terrible experience.

resp.text: Mr Brosemer, as we talked at the time, the stroller your wife purchased at time had been used by her outside the store, we personally witnessed her using it.  Further we told her that it was sold to her at a discount and we were very specific with her that it was not returnable.  In addition, the stroller smelled like cigarette smoke and we would not be able to re-sell it.  I am sorry your expectations were not the same as was your wife's.

PLEASE do not go here!  Shop at A Nurturing Moment or All About Baby!

text:

resp.text: Tammy, I am sorry to see that your experience at Posh Mommy & Baby Too was not positive. Should you have a negative experience, please take a moment to find me in the store and share your issue. We will do our best to try to satisfy your needs.

name: Yvette Torbert

name: Samantha Rudolph
text: We have always been satisfied with the service we received from Ashley Home Store. On August 1st they went above their service to help their customer. My husband was on his way to pick up a set of mattresses for our daughter who had recently moved to Andalusia. He encounter a storm when he arrived at the store the lights were off and no one answered the phone. He thought they were closed but the storm caused a power outage. He saw an Ashley Truck pull in so he followed. The sales person and the delivery men were so nice they delivered the mattress to keep them from getting ruined. Our prayers were answered. Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you for your review and your business with our store. We will pass on your comments to the store. We look forward to your return for other products you may need.

name: Rachel Jenkins
text: I bought a sectional from Ashley Furniture for an upstairs room.  The day of delivery I had the home builder on site because I was worried the sectional wouldn’t fit.  I was prepared to remove the door casing if needed to get the sectional into the room.  I told the delivery people to let me know if the casing needed to be removed.  They wedged the corner piece into the room without removing the casing.  The sectional is now permenantly stained with paint from the casing.  The wall and door casing in the entryway are also damaged.  I took photos to document and called Ashley furniture customer service department and spoke to Emily.  Emily sent a professional cleaner out, but the paint could not be removed.  I contacted Emily, and she told me she ordered me another wedge.  At this point, I don’t want to do any more damage. I asked her to discount the sectional and repair the damaged door casing, and I would be happy to keep the sectional with paint on it. Emily told me she could knock $75 off of the price.  I don’t consider that a discount after I paid for delivery and will have to take off work 2 days...once for the professional cleaners and once for the wall to be repaired.  I hope customer service can do more for me to make this right.

resp.text: We have looked into all the aspects of this and we can not find any customer in our database that has this issue. We don't have an Emily that works for us anywhere in the company but if you can please reach out to our store manager (JoAnn) so that we can help you get this resolved. Thank you

name: Phillip Morgan
text: I am from Andalusia and purchased several pieces of furniture from the Andalusia store. Shipping was delayed as that seems to be standard business these days, but Joann the store manager found a display couch in the warehouse got it approved and saved me a return trip to Auburn as we are moving our daughter in Saturday. If companies don't start thinking about customers as people many will be going out of business, thank you Joann for dealing in reality, you are the best.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and your business with our store. We will pass on your comments to the store personnel and we look forward to your return for other product you may need.

name: Kelsy Ward
text: I went in this store and purchased a couch and loveseat. I ordered it in a cobblestone color. Well, today my couches arrived and they are brown. I stopped the delivery men immediately and proceeded to call Joann at the store. After waiting 10-15 minutes on the phone while she looked for my order, she admitted she had written down the wrong number for the color I wanted. Mind you, I’ve already moved all my old furniture out of my living room, I have 2 kids, and my couches were to be delivered today. I was not expecting such a big error. So my solution was, I’ll keep the brown couches and you can just issue me a partial refund since it was your mistake. Do you know the only thing that she was willing to refund was the delivery fee? I thought a partial refund was fair to ask for since it was her error. Not pleased at all.

resp.text: We do apologize for this error and there is more options for us to make this right for you. We do pride ourselves on customer service. We will contact the store and speak to the manager and then contact you concerning this situation.

name: Mike W
text:
Wanted to express my thanks for the high level of service we received after our furniture purchase last year.
We purchased the Bladen Living room set from the Andalusia store and have been very pleased with the purchase. A few weeks ago we had a unfortunate incident occur when left 2 of our cushions damaged, and in need of replacement. I contacted Ashley Furniture and spoke with JoAnn. After explaining my situation, she without hesitation listened to my concerns, and made things right ordering 2 new items for our couch, receiving them a few weeks later.
You commonly do not see this level of attentiveness, and heightened customer service in retail, but Ashley furniture in Andalusia, it’s staff and management made the difference.

text: I've shopped here several times and the staff is very friendly, helpful and professional. name: James Brooks
text: I highly recommend purchasing furniture here. The owner is a very kind man who you can tell has been in the business for a very long time. When purchasing something that can cost as much as furniture does now, it is important to purchase from someone who will honor their word. Not only did they offer several ways for us to finance, but delivery quick being recently relocated to this remote area in Alabama and no family to help move furniture was extremely nice. The owner gave us real honest advice not based off purely an income percentage of what he would receive on each piece. Because we were buying a complete living room and bedroom package including a mattress it was a big purchase and he was willing to help with the more that we purchased. I recently have had several back surgeries and the mattress was the most important piece. He personally spent quite a while with us walking through explaining the purpose of each detail on each mattress and again we were first time home buyers so we didn't really know what we were doing with buying a mattress; never had anything besides hand-me-downs. All in all an incredible experience and would recommend anyone who desires longevity with their purchase of something this magnitude to not buy second hand stuff and purchase from Harvey's where they keep their promises!!!!!!!

name: Carroll Hosey6uy vv
text:
Changing my rating to a LESS THAN ONE STAR FOR BOTH LOCATIONS!!! I was so happy to originally give good rating to Alexander City store, I had found the 2 Lazy Boy recliners I had been searching for.... and she checked to make sure they were NOT on back order.. so image my surprise that now, 18 days later than they were promised, I STILL HAVE NOT RECEIVED THEM, they have not been delivered to the store. I should have picked them up on April 2nd. Since then, I have been told "they will be on our next truck, call back Tuesday" "call back Friday"  "I called and verified that they would be in our warehouse the 16th" I'm leaving my original post, so everyone can see the whole story behind trying to get 2 recliners from your store!
I live in Sylacauga and went to our local Badcock store. I found the recliner that I had been searching for and asked if it was available in a different color. The sales lady rushed to answer "No" without checking their website or trying to verify her answer... I left there and went online, found the lady had lied and it WAS available in the color I wanted. So I drove to a neighboring city store and found a sales lady who was more than eager to help me... so I give the Sylacauga location a 1 Star rating, but the Alexander City location gets 5+ stars! Very happy with the lady there! Too bad I couldn't do business in my hometown.....

resp.text:
Hi Carroll,

Our sincerest apologies. Customer service is a priority for us, and we're sorry to see your experience was a disappointing one. Our Corporate Team would like to look into this for you. If there is anything we can do differently that might better serve you as our valued customer, please reach out by calling 1-800-223-2625 or email customer.service@badcock.com. We appreciate your feedback, and are glad to see you had a positive experience during your second visit to our store.

name: Colin Tomblin
text: Awesome furniture and lighting. It’s a little pricey but great quality. The only downside to this location is that it is quite small with not much to see on display. There weren’t many employees available to offer assistance or answer questions. I highly recommend visiting the multi level Nashville location if you want a better experience.

name: SantanaTyree
text:
SAVE YOURSELF THE TIME AND DO NOT GO HERE. See below:

The customer service was absolutely awful. If you are looking for a warm, inviting environment, RH at the Summit isn’t the place whatsoever. You will be completely disappointed if you receive the treatment we did. You will especially be disappointed and appalled if you had just left Bassett Furniture in Hoover where they took the time to do the following: cultivate a relationship, show you around their showroom, listen to what your needs are, and sit down to customize furniture based on your specifications. For lack of words, the feeling that my husband and I received at RH: “We are RH, our products speak for themselves, so we are not going to do our job at all. We are not going to try to educate them on our selections/options. I am not leaving my computer to assess their needs. If they want something, they’ll ask me then buy it.” The ONLY information we were given was about looking online and a RH book when we got ready to leave because I couldn’t take it any longer. Not once did the lady offer to look at fabrics with us, to go over color selections, discuss what their process was, etc. (We were wanting custom furniture for a spec home and this was stated.) When I asked a question, the response was very much short and NON-informative, I was told to look online which defeats the entire purpose of going in store. The lack of willingness to assist us has left a LASTING impression. Because of that, we are HAPPY to spend MORE elsewhere because of superb customer service. There are numerous competitors; a product can easily be mimicked, customer service can’t.

name: Vicki Dukes
text: I had been looking for a table and chairs for my kitchen. Found what I wanted online. I wasn’t ready to order, though, without seeing it. My husband and I made the 1.5 hour trip to Bham. I had talked to Loren on the phone before I came. When we got there, Loren helped us. She was very professional and knew what she was talking about. It was a very good experience.

name: Brian Panos
text: Nice stuff but pricey!

name: Jennifer Jones
text: Thank God for Rebekah!! I visited RH for the first time on 10/26 during my quick little birthday getaway. This was actually my first time EVER visiting an RH store. Rebekah greeted me enthusiastically. She was so nice and personable as she engaged with me and answered any and all questions that I had. I really enjoyed chatting with her. She was very cheerful, bubbly, and helpful. I really didn't sense the same vibe from the other few associates I saw standing around in the store. The guy who greeted me at the door was also warm ams and inviting. Thank you soooo much Rebekah for being so friendly and kind!!! Little did she know, I had just lost one of my closest friends to Covid-19 who was buried just that Saturday before. So, I was out and about trying to enjoy my birthday in spite of. This was my first visit to the Summit, and Rebekah was one the best experiences I had that day. She really need to spend time over at Saks and Seasons 52 training some of the sales associates and waiters on good customer service and how to demonstrate it. God bless you Rebekah!!

name: ivo horak
text: Bought a cloud with terrible cushions that don’t hold their fill just after a single use.   There is no way a cushion should have to be disconnected and fluffed every single time.    Now they told me that it would cost $1400 to replace them to cushions  that will hold their shape.   Extremely disappointed with a multi million dollar company that can’t remedy a simple problem.

name: Wallace Brown
text: Excellent service and great quality.

name: Quitta Williams
text: Really big zoo. Beautiful animals. We enjoyed it.

name: Sam Wilson
text: Our experience at this store has been maybe the best experience we have ever had. Rebecca Howsam is incredible. She is not only a pleasure to work with, she is friendly and helpful and always puts customer first.  She has went out of her way to make sure we are happy and love our furniture - both inside furniture and outside.  Thank you Rebecca.

name: Susan Hanley
text: If you could assign less than one star I certainly would. I just spent over 20 minutes in Restoration Hardware at the Summit waiting for someone to wait on me (or even speak to me) and obviously they do not need my business because they did not even acknowledge me although they looked over at me several times. There were three sales associates and at the very beginning they were each with someone but then one became available when her customer left and she immediately disappeared to the back of the store. Again keep in mind they all saw me and said nothing and when the sales rep  finally came back out from wherever she went, another person  walked into the store and she asked if she could help them. Wow! I wanted to purchase a king bedroom suite I saw in their catalog which would have been well over a $10k purchase but I guess they do not need my business. I’m taking it somewhere that someone will actually acknowledge you  walked into their store.

name: Peyton Preece
text: We have spent over $15,000 in furniture from RH, live 2.5 hours away and pay over $350 for shipping each time we order or buy something. They were unwilling to replace a defective rug (they deemed it defective) and discount another rug we were willing to buy. Do yourself a favor and go elsewhere.

text: so so

name: Erin Young
text: About a month ago I came into the Ashley furniture outlet location to look for a chaise sofa for my first apartment since recently graduating college. Jordan was a great help and I just got my sofa delivered today and I love it! Jordan was patient and helped me narrow down my decision. Her fun personality made her a joy to work with. I also really appreciate her staying in touch with me via text throughout the whole process to make sure I didn’t have any unanswered questions and to keep me updated.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are so glad to hear that Jordan was able to give you a great furniture buying experience. We hope you will visit us again!

name: Carrie Hughes
text: Horrible! My husband and I went into the store March 13, 2021, purchased a Recliner, Love Seat and Couch, Mattress and Box Spring. The sales guy told us takes 6-8 weeks for delivery ( He lied .. he was just trying to make  a sale). We paid in Full and also have on our CONTRACT Delivery 5/3/2021!!!! Checked on the status and it was then pushed back to JULY 26, 2021!!! Now July is here and now they are saying  it would be now September/October!!!!! We spoke to the Manager JOSH and he would not do refund!!! We are now with out furniture for our new house that we we paid in full!  They are seriously scamming people.. I will NOT ever buy here again!! Seems like this has happened ALOT to several other customers. They care nothing about their customers and ONLY about making a sale!! We are now in the process of taking legal actions due to them breaking their contract with us 3 different times!! I will not wait around until October for my furniture to only have them tell me AGAIN its been pushed back on delivery!  GO SOMEWHERE ELSE FOR FURNITURE!!!!!!

resp.text: Ms. Hughs. I am sorry to hear that your experience has been this bad at the Ashley Outlet. This is certainly not up to our standards. We would like to reach out to you to resolve this issue. If you will, please send us your Name, Number and email, and potentially your receipt number to Cescalation@ahsmal.com. We would like a member of our management team to help you on this issue and make things right.

name: Glenn Taylor
text: We went in for a couch and love seat.  Met by Mario, who helped us with selection and options.  Everything was clear, pricing made sense, and Mario took the time to explain what comes, for example, with the protection plan.  He wasn't pushy, just helpful, and he knew his stuff.  Strongly recommend this store and especially Mario.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are so glad to hear that Mario was able to give you a great furniture buying experience. We hope you will visit us again!

name: Leigh Anne Dagalea
text: I purchased Doorbuster sectional on layaway in March 2021. I completely paid it at the beginning of April 2021. From the time I fully purchased it in April to the end of May. No one had informed me of the status. I would call the store once every other week. When I called the facility they told me that the furniture was not showing delivery date. I showed concern that I have not received any possible delievery date and asked to speak to the store manager about finding another item with tbe same value that is available. Finally the store manager, (after I was concerned) said that it should be here the first week of June. I decided to not find a replacement since the manager seemed to be sure the furniture will be there. I called after the first week of June since I received no contacted in regards to delivery or any issues. Manager than proceeded to say it is now pushed to the first week of July. I received a call last week and the week prior telling me that my furniture was scheduled for first week of July. After first week of July passed, I called them Monday, July 12th, to be informed that it was again pushed to the week of July 26th. I asked the sales associate if I could get a full refund because their poor communication. And customer service makes me uneasy and I do not trust them that they will delivery my item. The manager was not there and the person said he will contact me on Wednesday when he returns. They told me that refund would not be possible because of the 72 hour no cancellation. I proceeded to call cooperate to file a complaint on their store and because it is privately owned they could not help me. They filed a complaint and said they will get in contact with me within 24-48 hours. After I received no response from cooperate and the store, I called cooperate again. During the process of calling cooperate on Friday, July 16th (less than four days since the last conversation with the store) I found out that the corner of my section is in the warehouse but that other pieces will be in august 26th. Again another time pushed and no response. Each time the dates have been undetermined or pushed further. There is no promise of a secure date. They are persistent on telling me cancellations are not possible due to the 72 hours after full purchase but yet this company does not hold themselves accountable to communication and delivery if their items. After long conversation, the sales associate on Friday, July 16th said the manager will issue a request for cancellation to the finance department and I will receive a paper check refund. I called today July 20th to ask about the status. The request was given to the finance department and now waiting for the finance department to contact me about my refund. The sales associate said that it will take up to 14 days. This is ridiculous. I understand that we are in Covid 19 times. But their customer service is lacking and their concern for their customers is lacking.

resp.text: Hello Ms. Dagalea. I would like to apologize on behalf of the Ashley Homestore Outlet. We strive to better ourselves every day. Customer service is no different. We are working hard to become efficient with everything we do in our company, I have showed this review to our General Manager, and he would like to reach out to you. Please send an email to Cescalation@ahsmal.com with your receipt, name and phone number, as well as the email that was used on file. We want to make things right.

name: Palina Luangkhot
text: I would definitely recommend coming here for all your furniture needs. They have a great selection and Jordan helped me throughout the whole process! She made everything fast and easy. I will be going back for my future furniture purchases.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are so glad to hear that Jordan was able to give you a great furniture buying experience. We hope you will visit us again!

text: It was my first time in the store I was led by someone one to Try Ashley Discount store. I was already in the area so that made it very easy. Location is perfect. Soon as I walked in I was greeted by Mario and he immediately asked me did I needed any help. I told him what I wanted and he took me straight to what I was looking for. Even though the delivery is a little off the great customer service Mario delivered is what sold me. He told me everything I needed to know very detailed on the dates and kept it real. And I was in and out ! So that’s a plus! Thanks Mario !

text: My experience at Ashley’s was great. The customer service was quick and thorough. I got exactly what I wanted. I will definitely be back. Thank you again Ashaunna

name: James Boyer
text:
We have a lot of Ashley Furniture. We ordered nearly $7,000 worth of furniture on April 18/2021 with a estimated delivery date of 5/31/2021. It is now 7/19/2021 and we still have NO furniture. We just got off the phone and the estimate delivery date for some of the furniture is not until DECEMBER!

So, if you want to pay thousands of dollars for furniture that you will not get for 8 months, then this is your place.

We have been living in our home with our kids on mattresses on the floor, no living room furniture, no dining room furniture, incomplete office furniture, etc, etc.

No more excuses for companies operating like this. We are now fighting for our money back that has been wrapped up for many months so we can go somewhere that sells furniture and not just dreams of "someday" furniture.

Absolutely awful.

resp.text: Hello. I am sorry to hear about your experience, and on behalf of the Ashley Outlet I would like to apologize. If you will, please send us an email at Cescalation@ahsmal.com with your name, receipt number, phone number and email and a member of our management team will be with you as soon as we can.

name: Alysha Meighan

name: myla harper
text: It’s been three weeks now and I’m still not a happy customer. Please refer to Ashley Homestore’s Facebook page to see my review in detail. The sales clerk ordered the wrong item. The delivery team did not honor their delivery time slot and did not have the decency to inform me in a timely manner that they were coming 2 hours early. They left the wrong dresser. I called Emmitt, the store manager, and requested for them to return to pick up the dresser, needless to say the dresser remained in my home for three weeks. I tried to contact the general manager, Nick on two occasions and, Emmitt was of no assistance and he never returned my phone calls either. After finally getting a scheduled pickup a week and a day later, the delivery team was an hour and 15 minutes late with once again no phone call or text. After posting my experience on their Facebook page, Nick called leaving a message with my phone number as the return contact. Also, someone from their management team left an email address that was not accurate. I say all this to say, my concerns have not been resolved and I did not receive the correct dresser that I paid for. Ashley Homestore will NOT admit their mistakes, correct their mistakes, nor treat their customers with respect. I spent right at $6000 and this is how they treat their customers. I pray that you read this review and reconsider patronizing this establishment.

resp.text: Hello. We have seen your review and want to make things right. If you will, please send us an email at cescalation@ahsmal.com with the name, email, and phone number on your ticket, and a team member will be with you as soon as we can. We appreciate your support and business.

name: T Trask
text: Dee Dee was friendly and very helpful from the time I entered the store. Of course, one of the big "dogs" Alex came over to assist her BUT I will say, I didn't purchased anything I didn't want. In addition, the discounts were my stamp of approval. Thanks Dee Dee and Alex for your great customer service.

name: Lucero Montoya
text: Thank you to Josh for helping and being very thorough with our questions.  If you are looking for new furniture for your home, get Josh to help! He’s the best! Super professional and friendly.

name: william gipson
text: On March 20, 2021 I purchased a complete Leather reclining sofa, love seat and chair set in which I paid for upfront in full. Josh and I agreed on a (out the door) price that he stated would included free delivery and would include the best warranty that I could purchase. Once I got to the register to check out I was charged an additional 199.00 that was supposed to have been already applied to our agreed upon total. I didn't notice until after I left and looked over the receipt of this infraction. They told me that the set wasn't in stock and would take 3 weeks to be delivered. I offered several time to pick the set up myself but they insisted that I let them bring it out and set it up for free so I agreed. They told me that the set would come in a different dates and offered me split delivery. I told them I'd prefer if we just wait an get it all delivered at 1 time when it all arrived and they agreed. Fast forward to Thursday April 8th I called and was told that only 2 pieces were in but they were all scheduled to be there the week of the 8th. Friday the 9th I called bk and was told that the set was there. I asked when would it be delivered and was told that I had to come pick it up and that it wouldn't be delivered. Therefore I (rented) a haul and angrily went to to their store to pick it up. Once I got there I was told that it wasn't there and was at the warehouse which contradicted everything that I was told and wasn't where I originally paid for the set. At this point I was furious and Josh wasn't there so I was told. They then called him/Josh and he magically appeared from the back of the store smiling with mischief all over his face. Once he got close enough to see the anger in my eyes he detoured behind me and finally stood behind the counter accompanying the other 2 young ladies. He lied and tried to tell me that I wasn't given or offered free delivery but one of the assistants who also helped me select the set( she in particular was great and very helpful and even apologized) agreed that I was supposed to have free delivery. I then told him about the split delivery in which I knew nothing about until they offered and he dropped his head knowing that I was being honest. At this point I was furious but still needed my set. They then told me that it was at the warehouse and that the warehouse was closed. This is after they told me that it was at their location and I had to come pick it up. So now I'm standing there with a rented uhaul, being double charged for a warranty, furious and still not able to get my furniture. Long story short I still have to go pick it up again today. I would've canceled it all together but your charged a  25% restocking fee and can't return it over 3 days after the original purchase date. Josh continued to try and lie and say he told me this or that and I made him out to be a lie everytime. Josh is a lier so don't let those fb commercials fool you. My set was over 4k and paid upfront. Read over your receips as soon as you get it and make sure everything you agreed upon is stated and accurate. This is my personal experience, hopefully this will detour you from having a disastrous nightmare just as I did. Please shop else where. Hopefully everything goes smooth today once I go to pick it up.

resp.text: Hello Mr. Gipson. Firstly, I would like to apologize for any miscommunications or any tribulations experienced with the Ashley Homestore Outlet. From my understanding of the matter, there were many miscommunications on the team's behalf. I am not sure why there was so much confusion with the Customer Service on this particular order, and this will be addressed to them. We are experiencing delays on orders due to covid, and though this is a common response for almost all things furniture nowadays, it is honestly the truth. Again, I would like to apologize for the lack of communication resulting in you prematurely renting a U-haul. Our Warehouse hours differ from the store hours, and this should have been addressed upfront ahead of time. I truly feel that if things had been communicated better, a lot of these issues would have been easily resolved, and that is our fault. On behalf of the company we hope you will accept our apology, and please feel free to discuss this matter further at cescalations@ahsmal.com, and a manager will respond.  With all this said, we want to thank you for shopping with us and appreciate you being a member of our community. We are striving daily to improve our business to ensure that things like this no longer happen.

Protecting your customers should be a top concern. We immediately walked out to shop elsewhere that follows COVID guidelines.

name: Darrelle Townsend
text: Me and my fiancé drove 2.5 hours away to go to this new outlet on its Grand Opening day that we saw advertised on Facebook. We were greeted by a salesman named Alex. He seemed to be a nice guy well versed and educated in product knowledge of everything they had to showcase and sell. We instructed him that we were just looking but we'd come back if we were interested in doing business. He and his manager promised exceptional customer service. We came back about a month later ready to purchase. We spent almost $7,000 with this salesman and company and was sold several empty promises. We were told that we'd have all of our furniture at the store ready to be delivered to our brand new home that we were building by the first week of December. That didn't happen. We were promised several different customer service calls concerning our furniture. They never happened. In December we were told for 3 weeks straight that our stuff was coming and it didn't come. Finally we got some of our things only to find out that as our stuff was coming off the truck that the delivery guys forgot the mounts to put our mirror up that goes to our dresser. Also that Alex ordered 2 loveseats instead of a sofa and loveseat. When I called to make him aware of his mistake I was told immediately that it was my fault as if I made up the invoice myself. I spoke with the manager Josh he apologized and put in a new invoice for a new sofa. He said that our recliner which we are still waiting on would be here the same time the sofa would, which would be Jan. 15th. I was told that if anything changed that I would receive a call. Guess what? That didn't happen either. After the delivery guys left I noticed that they messed up my front door casing in 2 different places. I called this Thursday to inform them of the damage and check to make sure everything was still on track and yet again I was given the run around by the employees and manager Josh as to when my stuff would arrive. Finally he said that yet again its been pushed back to the first week in February. He gave me Ashley's customer service email to send proof of damage and I was told I would receive a call or email concerning the damages as you might've guessed THAT! DIDN'T! HAPPEN!  Before ending our call he said he was going to give me a call the next day at 9:30 when he starts his customer service calls and you guessed it IT NEVER HAPPENED! Mind you we placed our entire order at one time in OCTOBER!!! We were told that there was a 6-8 week wait to receive our stuff which we were fine with because our home would be finished being built by then. It's now January and still were being given the run around. I have never experienced such unprofessionalism, deplorable customer service, and lies by a company who's standards are supposed to be way above par. I am livid and hate that I ever gave this company my business. They care nothing about their customers only about the quick buck that they can get. I wouldn't advise anyone to ever do business with this establishment. Your just another sale to them and they give you nothing but empty promises. If I could've given no stars I would have! WORST EXPERIENCE EVER!!!

name: Josh Yates
text:
Overall, I'm satisfied with my purchase at the Montgomery, Alabama location.  Management was very good.  Prices seemed to be excellent.  Quality seemed to be excellent.  Selection was very good.  The -2 star is because of my delivery.  I paid $75 cash for delivery, which is fine.  But, after all my furniture was placed inside my apartment and the delivery men left, I failed to check to make sure everything was delivered correctly.  The next day I open the box that contained my headboard and it was the wrong size and color.  Management had a new headboard delivered to me, but the delivery man refused to take back the incorrect headboard because he said, "I don't have the paper.", so I took the headboard back to the American Freight warehouse.

Within the next few days, I opened the mirror to my dresser and it was the wrong color.  I took the mirror back to the American Freight warehouse and management swapped it out for me.  In the end, I happy with my furniture but it appears my $75 delivery cost was wasted on my end due to the driving back and forth a few times to fix a few mistakes the delivery men made with my purchase.  Before the delivery men leave your location, double check your furniture.

text: Always a friendly environment great. Had a big misunderstanding about when the furniture I ordered will be in even though I was assured that it will be in about four weeks. After a few phone calls and no furniture I decided to pay them a visit. The store manager Rodney went above and beyond to make sure that I got my furniture the following week. Was shock to find out the he actually drove 2 hours to get my furniture. Even though it took a week later I appreciate him going out his way. Will definitely be shopping here again.

name: Kori Anderson
text:
DO NOT BUY FROM AMERICAN FREIGHT IN MONTGOMERY! They are very unprofessional and unorganized. We bought basically a whole house worth of furniture, when it was time for delivery they informed us that our sectional was not in stock and that it’ll be in stock in 2 weeks and that they’ll deliver it out to us with no delivery fee but we could still get our bedroom suite that we ordered.
Incident #1: On delivery day I had to call and ask what time would the furniture be in because we were out running errands. They forgot to put our furniture on the truck and the delivery people had to come back and get it🙄 (I’m sure if I had not called I would not have known)
Incident #2:Two weeks later, which was on yesterday (Sunday) at around 12pm I called and spoke with OJay and asked was our furniture in. She told me yes(why didn’t they call?) and that they can deliver it out same day. Okay cool. She then called back and said that we didn’t pay all of our delivery fee which in fact when they delivered our furniture the first time my boyfriend gave them the delivery free PLUS A TIP. She then told me that it was okay and that they would take care of it. Later that day, at 4pm, I called again just checking to see what time they would be coming. The guy I spoke with asked would I be okay with getting it delivered first thing Monday morning. Uhh no. (My problem with this was WHY DIDN’T ANYBODY CALL, I would be okay if they had the common courtesy to inform me of any issues instead of me having to call them.) The guy told me my furniture should be at my house no later than 10:45AM(I didn’t know how if they opened at 11am) I asked was he sure and he said yes.
SO THIS MORNING MY FURNITURE WAS NOT AT MY HOUSE AT 10:45! I called promptly AT 11am and spoke w/ the manger Rodney and he informed me that a driver was on the way to get my furniture to deliver it. If my furniture was not able to be at my house at 10:45AM they should have communicated that with me. I received my furniture at 12pm after all the mess I had to go through. I appreciate it if you guys would be more professional with your customers and communicated more with your drivers. I should not have to go through this hassle of getting furniture delivered and I WILL NOT shop with you guys again. Have a good day!!
